headline: Wildfires Pose Threat  To Vivid Grasshoppers And Velvety Worms
abstract: Velvet worms, trapdoor spiders: Scientists worry about the fate of the nation’s many remarkable, overlooked endemic creatures.
lead_paragraph: SYDNEY, Australia — When Tanya Latty, an entomologist at the University of Sydney, started studying a species of velvet worm 18 months ago, she thought it was just a side project.
